name: Quintessence
description: Quintessence is the measure of power related to pure magickal energy. It can be used to power casting or fuel effects.

name: Paradox
description: Paradox is the degree to which reality has been warped by the mage's actions. It is a negative trait, and its rating is used to determine how powerful a backlash from breaking the laws of magic will be.

name: Arete
description: Arete is the measure of a mage's skill at magic.

name: Enlightenment
description: Enlightenment is a Technocrat's way of saying 'Arete.'

name: Dynamic
description: The level to which a Mage has been influenced by the dynamic forces of the Metaphysical Trinity.

name: Entropic
description: The level to which a Mage has been influenced by the entropic forces of the Metaphysical Trinity.

name: Static
description: The level to which a Mage has been influenced by the static forces of the Metaphysical Trinity.

name: Resonance
description: Resonance is the indication of how a Mage's spells appear, often acting as a kind of signature.

name: Mana
description: Mana is the measure of power related to static magic energy. It can be used to power casting or fuel effects by hedge wizards and sorcerers.
